short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to help restaurants earn rewards

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Earn Automatic CashBack as you order!

Booyah! empowers restaurants and other food service operators automatically earn CashBack rebates as they shop. Booyah! plugs right into your internet browser – order food and supplies on your distributors’ websites just as you normally do, and Booyah! adds CashBack on your food, non-food, packaging and specialty vendors. Booyah! has pre-negotiated CashBack/rebate contracts on over 150,000 line items from 300+ manufacturers. Our CashBack coverage includes the most popular items that restaurants buy every day including name-brand chicken breast, garbage bags, carry-out containers, salad dressings and everything else to fill your walk-in freezer.

Quickly install the Booyah! plug-in to your browser and we will make sure you get every dollar of cash back on every vendor website you buy from!  Even office supply, non-foods, packaging and specialty vendors! 

Booyah! helps you uncover new areas for savings by recommending products that help you earn more CashBack. As you browse your ordering portal(s) Booyah! highlights items that have CashBack and special savings. 

Booyah! is a secure browser extension that won’t interfere with your day to day purchases. This FREE tool was designed specifically to help restaurants maximize their savings and boost their profitability.
